name: 100 Year Dungeon
description:
You have returned to the dungeon of your youth but are too old to collect the treasure hidden inside! You must "rewind" to your younger days in order to be strong enough to make it through the dungeon. But beware, this dungeon was home to a dangerous cult back in the day, and when you return to the past they are waiting there for you! Can you best the 100 year dungeon or will you become lost in the past?

(Submitted for Brackey's 2020.2 Game Jam)

WASD to move

R to "Rewind"

Space to Jump

ESC to exit
